question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

question: My account is locked
answer: If your account is locked, please contact our support team at support@example.com or call our helpline at 1-800-123-4567.

question: How do I update my payment method?
answer: You can update your payment method by going to Account Settings > Billing > Payment Methods. Click 'Add Payment Method' to add a new card.

question: Why was my payment declined?
answer: Payments can be declined for several reasons: insufficient funds, expired card, or incorrect billing information. Please check your details and try again or contact your bank.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: To cancel your subscription, go to Account Settings > Subscription and click 'Cancel Subscription'. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: To report a bug, please go to Help > Report a Bug and fill out the form with details about the issue including steps to reproduce, expected behavior, and actual behavior.

question: I have a feature request
answer: We'd love to hear your feature requests! Please go to Help > Feature Request and describe what you'd like to see in our product.

question: How do I export my data?
answer: To export your data, go to Account Settings > Privacy > Data Export. Select the data types you want to export and click 'Request Export'.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: To delete your account, go to Account Settings > Privacy > Delete Account. Follow the instructions to confirm account deletion. Note that this action is irreversible.
